front.title: Network measurement intent - one of IBN use cases

abstract.t: As an important technical means to detect network state, network measurement has attracted more and more attention in the development of network. However, the current network measurement technology has the problem that the measurement method and the measurement purpose cannot match well. To solve this problem, this memo introduces network measurement intent, namely the process of realizing user or network operator to allocate network states as needed. And it can be as a specified user case of intent based network.
